TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MessageQuery extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义类的核心行为，这些类用于搜索消息中特定的相关数据。

span.span: Defines the core behavior of classes used to search for specific correlating data in a message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类与 类相似。The class is similar to the class. 但 方法将返回针对一个消息的查询的计算结果，而不是返回匹配项。However, instead of returning matches, the method returns the results of evaluating a query against a message. 该查询的结果为此消息中的一个值。The result of the query is a value in the message. 将该值用作键以将此消息与其他消息关联起来。Use the value as a key to correlate the message to other messages. 若要为数据添加一个新属性，请使用 类的 方法。To add a new property for the data, use the method of the class. > [!NOTE] > 有关 的具体实现，请参见 类。For a concrete implementation of the , see the class. ## 使用 XPathMessageQuery 和 MessageQueryCollection 类Using the XPathMessageQuery and MessageQueryCollection classes 可以通过创建一组查询对象并将它们插入 类的实例中来优化查询过程。You can optimize the query process by creating a set of query objects and inserting them into an instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 有关 的具体实现，请参见 类。For a concrete implementation of the , see the class. 常见用法是在集合中填入查询，这些查询具有相同的 XPath 谓词，只是其最终叶值不同。A common usage is to populate the collection with queries that have the same XPath predicate, but that differ only in the final leaf value. 例如，以下 XPath 查询相同，唯一的区别是它们的最终子句不同。For example, the following XPath queries are identical except for the final clause. 第一个查询查找所有 quantity 特性设置为 1 的元素，第二个查询查找 product 特性设置为“Contoso”的元素：The first queries for all elements that have the quantity attribute set to 1, and the second queries for elements with the product attribute set to 'Contoso'): ``` "/s12:Envelope/s12:Body/PurchaseOrder/Items/Item[@quantity = 1]" "/s12:Envelope/s12:Body/PurchaseOrder/Items/Item[@product = 'Contoso']" ``` 利用 类，可以创建稍有不同的查询表，使处理更高效。The class allows you to create tables of queries that differ only slightly, enabling more efficient processing. 或者，可以使用 类来存储和计算消息查询。Alternatively, you can use the class to store and evaluate message queries. ## Examples 以下示例创建一个消息和 XPath 消息查询。The following example creates a message and XPath message queries. 这些查询由 对象中包含的 对象进行评估。The queries are evaluated by the objects contained in an object. 使用 类的 属性测试每个查询的结果。The results of each query are tested using the property of the class. [!code-csharp[XPathMessageQuery#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/xpathmessagequery/cs/source.cs#0)] [!code-vb[XPathMessageQuery#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/xpathmessagequery/vb/source.vb#0)]

summary.span: 创建一个查询集合，该集合返回与其关联的特定数据类型。

span.span: Creates a collection of queries that returns a specific type of data associated with it.

returns.span: ，与数据类型关联的查询的集合。

span.span: The collection of queries associated with the data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法应由 类使用。This method is intended to be used by the class.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，对消息运行一个查询并返回满足该查询的值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, runs a query against the message and returns a value that satisfies the query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个重载的区别是，一个重载使用 参数，但不允许其检查正文；另一个重载使用 参数，并可以检查消息的任何部分。The difference between the two overloads is that one takes a parameter and is not permitted to examine the body; the other takes a parameter and can examine any part of the message. 消息标头是自动缓冲的，并且无需使用即可对其进行查询。Message headers are automatically buffered and can be queried without being consumed. 不过，若要查询正文，则必须缓冲整个消息，因为查询可以使用未缓冲的消息正文。However, if the body is to be queried, then the entire message must be buffered because an unbuffered message body can be consumed by the query.

span.span: The type of the value to return.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，对消息运行一个查询并返回一个结果。

returns.span: 满足查询的结果的可枚举集合。

span.span: An enumerable collection of results that satisfy the query.
